title: Update footer copyright text with heart emoji

requirements.text: Update the footer copyright text to display '© 2025. With ❤ by FoxP2' (translated as: '© 2025. Z ❤ przez FoxP2' in Polish, '© 2025. With ❤ by FoxP2' in English, '© 2025. Mit ❤ von FoxP2' in German). Replace any existing copyright or credit text in the Footer component.

quotes: Zmień stopkę strony na "© 2025. Z "+emotikon serca+" przez FoxP2"

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays '© 2025. Z ❤ przez FoxP2' when Polish language is selected
Footer displays '© 2025. With ❤ by FoxP2' when English language is selected
Footer displays '© 2025. Mit ❤ von FoxP2' when German language is selected
The heart emoji (❤) is rendered correctly in all languages
Copyright text is properly styled and positioned within the footer

constraints: Do not modify the existing footer structure beyond the copyright text update
Maintain all existing footer functionality including logo, contact information, services list, and RODO button
